list.title: This Website
list.description: Website of links to all my projects

list.title: WPI ACM Website
list.description: A material website for the Computer Science club on campus

list.title: WPI GreenTeam Website
list.description: A bootstrap website for the environmental club on campus

list.title: MailingList
list.description: A website (for WPI again) to combine and orgsync and email alias lists together

list.title: OneArmBand
list.description: A project where we had various devices linked together through a server in order to make music and notes from one arm

list.title: HoloSense
list.description: Made echolocation app which allows you to walk around indoors without a cane with a hololens.

list.title: Lost & Found
list.description: A central place where WPI students can find and loose items

list.title: Nutrifact
list.description: A website/android app which reads the barcode and tells you whether there are any allergic substances/ingredients which you are not allowed to eat.

list.title: alphaStep
list.description: A webapp which can teach you to write any UTF-based letter or word, meaning any font and any lanaguage.

list.title: Todo list platform
list.description: A website combining the trello and habitica api to have a central place to look at your different todolists together.

list.title: KeyboardMario
list.description: A python program which listens to the event of keypress in archlinux, and plays a note in the mario song for each event.

list.title: CalendarToImage
list.description: A python program, which takes my events on google calendar and creates an square image with the events on them, so I can see my calendar on the ipod nano.

list.title: IEEE LED Sign
list.description: A python program which converts an image to displaying on the led sign made for the IEEE student organization.

list.title: MakeToMove
list.description: A giant geodesic dome which was created to encourage people to stop sitting and start moving.
